jedi:cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
jedi:cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Exhaust.
jedi:cleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

jedi:forcepull.NAME: Force Pull
jedi:forcepull.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw a card.

jedi:forcepush.NAME: Force Push
jedi:forcepush.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw a card.

jedi:crystallizedlightning.NAME: Crystallized Lightning
jedi:crystallizedlightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scales with Focus instead of Strength.
jedi:crystallizedlightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scales with Focus.

jedi:crystallizedfrost.NAME: Crystallized Frost
jedi:crystallizedfrost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scales with Focus instead of Dexterity.
jedi:crystallizedfrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scales !M! times with Focus instead of Dexterity.

jedi:crystallizeddark.NAME: Crystallized Dark
jedi:crystallizeddark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Focus affects this card !M! times. NL Is not affected by Strength.
